geneticAlgorithm

Class Population

  • java.lang.Object
    • geneticAlgorithm.Population

  • public class Population
extends java.lang.Object
    This class just model a Genetic Algorithm population, it can be the main population or an offspring
    Author:
    N. Ferrando, J. Alberdi-Rodriguez, E. Sanchez

      • print

        public void print(java.lang.String header)
        Prints to the standard output the current individuals, one line per individual with all its genes.
        Parameters:
        header - An string to be added at the beginning of the line.

      • getBestError

        public double getBestError()
        Returns the best error of the current population. It orders the population (if required) and returns the sum of the best individual
        Returns:
        the lowest error

      • getBestIndividual

        public Individual getBestIndividual()
        Returns the best individual of the current population. It orders the population (if required) and returns the best individual
        Returns:
        the best individual
